page.description: Generate a SQL Drop User Group statement.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateDropUserGroupStatement as C (Group as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

argument.name: Group
argument.description: The name of the group to delete.

page.discussion: The .GenerateDropUserGroupStatement() method returns the SQL statement that will delete a group.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateDropUserGroupStatement("Documentation") = "DROP GROUP Documentation"
